channel.title: [WIP] Golden Leaf
channel.description:
[IMG]http://www.imagehustler.com/0208/1202066027.png[/img]
Started it today.. Also started trying to code it since it's not that difficult of a template to code.. http://www.punjuice.org/new/

item.title: [WIP] Golden Leaf
item.dc:creator: @VB7_Rocks VB7 Rocks
item.description:
@VB7_Rocks wrote:

The leaf looks a bit weird, maybe add a little shadow or border thing around the edges so it’s more defined?

Also, the header doesn’t really work with the body of the page, I think it needs some sort of transition between the two.

Constructive criticism.

Read full topic

item.title: [WIP] Golden Leaf
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

[quote=“exe626, post:18, topic:178359”]Why is it always “Vista is shit”? I personally love Vista. It’s quite a marvel to have, tbh. I enjoy it much more than my laptop, which has XP. I plan to upgrade it to Vista soon.

As for the Golden Leaf, it’s quite interesting in the image. The way the border and text box area are so noticeably different ruins it for me. The tabs on top also, I enjoy the simplicity, it’s just the placement.

The web version looks better, I’d like to see it updated though.[/quote]

Been busy this weekend with quite a few tests and trying to figure out what to get my girlfriend for Valentines Day :…

Read full topic

item.title: [WIP] Golden Leaf
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

Why is it always “Vista is shit”? I personally love Vista. It’s quite a marvel to have, tbh. I enjoy it much more than my laptop, which has XP. I plan to upgrade it to Vista soon.

As for the Golden Leaf, it’s quite interesting in the image. The way the border and text box area are so noticeably different ruins it for me. The tabs on top also, I enjoy the simplicity, it’s just the placement.

The web version looks better, I’d like to see it updated though.

Read full topic

item.title: [WIP] Golden Leaf
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

[quote=“Mr.Chris, post:13, topic:178359”]Someone’s a bit upset that they have to stick with Vista. Trying to defend it for all it’s worth. Face it…It’s total crap.

I ran it on my custom made computer, pretty high-specs, but I removed because I realized XP was 100% better.[/quote]

Actually I’m not stuck with Vista, I have a XP installation disc next to my computer. GTFO of the bandwagon saying Vista is crap, it runs applications faster then XP thanks to SuperFetch.

Plus, if your computer is “pretty high-spec” and can’t run Vista, thats pretty sad. My 4 year old Compaq can run Vista with no trouble.

Meh, getting off topic…

Read full topic

item.title: [WIP] Golden Leaf
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

[quote=“FastBawlz, post:9, topic:178359”][quote author=Mr.Chris link=topic=239345.msg2032409#msg2032409 date=1202164319]

It keeps going “This program has stopped working…”

It’s like a new computer with loads of ram and processing power. Quad core mutha fucker.

It’s Vista, so it ruined that computer
[/quote]

Srsly, if your just going to talk shit GTFO…

Its not Vista thats wrong, its his shitty crack/patch. I’m running on a E4400 with 2gb ram and an on board video card and I run it fine…[/quote]

Someone’s a bit upset that they have to stick with Vista. Trying to defend it for all it’s worth. Face it…It’s total crap.

I ran it on my custom made computer, pretty high-specs, but I removed because I realized XP was 100% better.

Read full topic

item.title: [WIP] Golden Leaf
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

The only thing I can really say is that you can really notice the cutoff from the banner to the Lipsum body of the page.

In my opinion, it doesn’t blend right, but it might work for you. Who knows.
Maybe those empty spaces on the side bars could be filled with a navigation bar?
possiby some subtle blurred/glowed ‘gold leaves’ on the side, with maybe some vines swirling down?

lol. Just a random suggestion to make it more appealing.

item.title: [WIP] Golden Leaf
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

[quote=“goatee, post:2, topic:178359”]Looks… okay. Put [WIP] in your title cos it’s not finished (Yes I know you started today I’m just suggesting ).
Also in the code why not give it a vertical repeated image… so that the white doesn’t end and break the flow.

Looks nice though, keep all the links in one table/div so that you can still keep the “centeredness” without having buttons or doing it the long way.

It sucks so much that i was working for ages on a website design at my dads then shitty vista can’t handle CS3 and closes it. I spent a good 3 hours on it. I might start again on XP… while saving alot.[/quote]

Vista handles CS3 for me fine ;)…

Read full topic

Looks nice though, keep all the links in one table/div so that you can still keep the “centeredness” without having buttons or doing it the long way.
